lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We're on an open bed truck on the highway
The rain is comin' down and we're on the run
Think I can feel the breath in your body
We gotta keep on runnin' 'til we see the sun

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, you got a fire and it's burnin' in the rain
Thought that it went out, but it's burnin' just the same
And you don't look back, not for anything
'Cause if you love someone, you love them all the same
If you love someone, you love them all the same

[Chorus]
Oh, I feel your heartbeat
And you're comin' around, comin' around, comin' around
If you can love somebody, love them all the same
You gotta love somebody, love them all the same
Singin', oh, I feel your heartbeat

[Verse 2]
I'm tryna to put it all back together
I've got a story and I'm tryin' to tell it right
I got the kerosene and a desire
I'm tryna start a flame in the heart of the night

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, you got a fire and it's burnin' in the rain
Thought that it went out, but it's burnin' just the same
And you don't look back, not for anything
'Cause if you love someone, you love them all the same
If you love someone, you love them all the same

[Chorus]
Oh, I feel your heartbeat
And you're comin' around, comin' around, comin' around
If you can love somebody, love them all the same
You gotta love somebody, love them all the same
Singin', oh, I feel your heartbeat

[Bridge]
Ooh, ooh
I know the memories are rushin' into mind
I wanna kiss your scars tonight, baby
'Cause you gotta try, You gotta let me in
Let me in

[Chorus]
Oh, I feel your heartbeat
And you're comin' around, comin' around, comin' around
If you can love somebody, love them all the same
You gotta love somebody, love them all the same
Singin', oh, I feel your heartbeat

[Outro]
Oh yeah, oh yeah
Heartbeat
